kindle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if you kindle a fire, or if it kindles, it starts to burn
kindle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to make someone feel interested, excited, hopeful etc

kindle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a special small computer that you can hold in your hands and use to read an  e-book  (=book that is stored electronically rather being made of paper).
